name: Moonpie Simulator 2018
description:
Moonpie Simulator 2018 is a Race-against-the-clock driving game created by a team of 4 in the Spring of 2018.  The team set out originally to create a 1-to-1 scale map of their hometown, which ended up a bit smaller than planned in the end.  The limitations were due to the lab computers at the time, but they were still able to create some great visuals.

Team:

Colin M -  Programming and Art

Ryan M - Art

Dan S - Design

Michael D - Programming and Art

How to Play:

WASD to Drive
